querySql: select    t2.FNUMBER  as COMPANY_CODE, t2.FName_l2 as COMPANY_NAME, case when t1.FBillMedium=1 then '纸质' when t1.FBillMedium=2 then '电子' end as INVOICE_CLASS, t3.FName_l2 as INVOICE_TYPE, case when t1.FBillState=0 then '保存' when t1.FBillState=1 then '登记' when t1.FBillState=2 then '对外背书' when t1.FBillState=3 then '贴现' when t1.FBillState=4 then '收款' when t1.FBillState=7 then '对内背书' when t1.FBillState=8 then '审批' when t1.FBillState=9 then '作废' when t1.FBillState=10 then '转贷款' when t1.FBillState=11 then '入池质押' when t1.FBillState=12 then '入池托管' end as INVOICE_STATUS, t1.FIssuesDate  as SIGN_DATE, t1.FNumber as INSTRUMENT_BILL_NO, t1.FDraftNumber as INSTRUMENT_NO, case when t1.FIsNoUsed=1 then '是' when t1.FIsNoUsed=0 then '否' end as IS_NO_USED_INVOICE, t1.FDrawerName as INVOICE_BY, t1.FDrawerAccountName as INVOICE_BANK_ACCOUNT, t1.FDrawerBankName  as INVOICE_BANK_CODE, t1.FPayeeName as RECEIPT_BY, t1.FPayeeAccountName  as RECEIPT_BANK_ACCOUNT, t1.FPayeeBankName as RECEIPT_BANK_CODE, t4.Fnumber as CURRENCY_CODE, t4.FName_l2 as CURRENCY_NAME, t1.FBillAmt as BILL_AMT, t1.FExpiredDate as TIMELINE_DATE, t1.FTakeDate as RECEIPT_DATE, t1.FDeliverName as TICKET_HOLDER_BY, t5.FNUMBER as DEPARTMENT_CODE, t5.FName_l2 as RECEIPT_DEPARTMENT, t1.FTransferDate  as DATE_TRANSFER, t1.FPeriod as TERM_BILL, t1.FDiscountRate as DISCOUNT_RATE, t1.FDiscount as DISCOUNT_INTEREST, case when t1.FIsTrustee=1 then '是' when t1.FIsTrustee=0 then '否' end as IS_TRUSTEE, t3.FName_l2 as INVOICE_TYPE_A, case when t1.FIsPledge=1 then '是' when t1.FIsPledge=0 then '否' end as IS_PLEDGE, case when t1.FIsDisPledge=1 then '是' when t1.FIsDisPledge=0 then '否' end as IS_DISPLEDGE, case when t1.FIsCollect=1 then '是' when t1.FIsCollect=0 then '否' end as IS_COLLECT, t1.FCollectNum as COLLECTION_ACCOUNT, t6.Fnumber as COLLECTION_BANK_CODE, t6.Fname_l2 as COLLECTION_BANK_NAME, t1.FDigest as REMARK from T_NT_ReceivableBill t1 left join T_ORG_Company t2 on t2.Fid = t1.FCompanyID left join T_NT_NTType t3 on t3.Fid = t1.FNtTypeID left join T_BD_Currency t4 on t4.Fid = t1.FCurrencyID left join T_ORG_Admin t5 on t5.Fid = t1.FDepartmentID left join T_BD_Bank t6 on t6.Fid = t1.FCollectBankID where t1.FLastUpdateTime >= TO_DATE('2019-10-01 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and t1.FLastUpdateTime < TO_DATE('2020-03-01 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')  and  t1.FTakeDate <SYSDATE  order by t1.FCOMPANYID,t1.FNUMBER  --应收票据 sql
